verses.verse: Ask <S%H7592><s%> you of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> rain <S%H4306><s%> in the time <S%H6256><s%> of the latter <S%H4456><s%> rain; <S%H4456><s%> so the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall make <S%H6213><s%> bright <S%H2385><s%> clouds, <S%H2385><s%> and give <S%H5414><s%> them showers <S%H1653><s%> of rain, <S%H4306><s%> to every <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> grass <S%H6212><s%> in the field. <S%H7704><s%>

For the idols <S%H8655><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> vanity, <S%H205><s%> and the diviners <S%H7080><s%> have seen <S%H2372><s%> a lie, <S%H8267><s%> and have told <S%H1696><s%> false <S%H7723><s%> dreams; <S%H2472><s%> they comfort <S%H5162><s%> in vain: <S%H1892><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> they went <S%H5265><s%> their way as a flock, <S%H6629><s%> they were troubled, <S%H6031><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> there was no <S%H639><s%> shepherd. <S%H7462><s%>

My anger <S%H639><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the shepherds, <S%H7462><s%> and I punished <S%H6485><s%> the goats: <S%H6260><s%> for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> has visited <S%H6485><s%> his flock <S%H5739><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and has made <S%H7760><s%> them as his goodly <S%H1935><s%> horse <S%H5483><s%> in the battle. <S%H4421><s%>

Out of him came <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> the corner, <S%H6438><s%> out of him the nail, <S%H3489><s%> out of him the battle <S%H4421><s%> bow, <S%H7198><s%> out of him every <S%H3605><s%> oppressor <S%H5065><s%> together. <S%H3162><s%>

And they shall be as mighty <S%H1368><s%> men, which tread <S%H947><s%> down their enemies in the mire <S%H2916><s%> of the streets <S%H2351><s%> in the battle: <S%H4421><s%> and they shall fight, <S%H3898><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is with them, and the riders <S%H7392><s%> on horses <S%H5483><s%> shall be confounded. <S%H3001><s%>

And I will strengthen <S%H1396><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and I will save <S%H3467><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and I will bring <S%H7725><s%> them again <S%H7725><s%> to place <S%H3427><s%> them; for I have mercy <S%H7355><s%> on them: and they shall be as though <S%H834><s%> I had not cast <S%H2186><s%> them off: for I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> their God, <S%H430><s%> and will hear <S%H6030><s%> them.

And they of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> shall be like a mighty <S%H1368><s%> man, and their heart <S%H3820><s%> shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> as through wine: <S%H3196><s%> yes, their children <S%H1121><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> it, and be glad; <S%H8056><s%> their heart <S%H3820><s%> shall rejoice <S%H1523><s%> in the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
I will hiss <S%H8319><s%> for them, and gather <S%H6908><s%> them; for I have redeemed <S%H6299><s%> them: and they shall increase <S%H7235><s%> as they have increased. <S%H7235><s%>

And I will sow <S%H2232><s%> them among the people: <S%H5971><s%> and they shall remember <S%H2142><s%> me in far <S%H4801><s%> countries; and they shall live <S%H2421><s%> with their children, <S%H1121><s%> and turn <S%H7725><s%> again. <S%H7725><s%>

I will bring <S%H7725><s%> them again <S%H7725><s%> also out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and gather <S%H6908><s%> them out of Assyria; <S%H804><s%> and I will bring <S%H935><s%> them into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> and Lebanon; <S%H3844><s%> and place shall not be found <S%H4672><s%> for them.

And he shall pass <S%H5674><s%> through the sea <S%H3220><s%> with affliction, <S%H6869><s%> and shall smite <S%H5221><s%> the waves <S%H1530><s%> in the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the deeps <S%H4688><s%> of the river <S%H2975><s%> shall dry <S%H3001><s%> up: and the pride <S%H1347><s%> of Assyria <S%H804><s%> shall be brought <S%H3381><s%> down, <S%H3381><s%> and the scepter <S%H7626><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> shall depart <S%H5493><s%> away.
And I will strengthen <S%H1396><s%> them in the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and they shall walk <S%H1980><s%> up and down in his name, <S%H8034><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
